actions.in_committee: House Committee on Science, Space and Technology

official_title: To establish the National Environmental Sciences and Technology Agency, and for other purposes.
short_title: National Environmental Sciences and Technology Agency Act of 1992
subjects: Advice and consent of the Senate

summary.text: National Environmental Sciences and Technology Agency Act of 1992 - Establishes the National Environmental Sciences and Technology Agency whose primary responsibility shall be to maintain a scientific and technological base to enhance environmental regulation and help U.S. industry to be more competitive. Provides for: (1) an Administrator; (2) a Deputy Administrator; (3) five Assistant Administrators; and (4) an interagency executive committee. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: National Environmental Sciences and Technology Agency Act of 1992
To establish the National Environmental Sciences and Technology Agency, and for other purposes.
